tool_description: Calculates required lumber quantities in board feet, accounting for waste factors, milling losses, and project complexity.

project_dimensions.description: Overall project dimensions in inches [length, width, height]

component_count.description: Number of individual components or pieces needed

milling_loss.description: Material loss from planing and surfacing (5-20%)

error_messages: Invalid dimensions: Provide exactly 3 positive numbers for [length, width, height] in inches
Invalid component count: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 1000
Invalid lumber thickness: Must be a positive number, typically 0.75, 1.0, 1.5, or 2.0 inches
Invalid waste factor: Must be between 10 and 50 percent
Invalid milling loss: Must be between 5 and 20 percent
usage: Input project dimensions, component count, and lumber thickness. Adjust waste factor and milling loss based on project complexity and skill level.

base_board_feet.description: Basic board feet calculation without adjustments

total_board_feet.description: Final board feet needed including waste and milling losses

linear_feet.description: Equivalent linear feet for standard board widths

cost_multiplier.description: Factor applied to base quantity for total material needs
